titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Argentina
Argentina

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Argentina has several laws governing the right to access government information. However, it does not have a national law that covers diplomatic archives.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: Leandro N. Alem 246, C1003AAP Buenos Aires.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Esmeralda 1212, C1007ABR, Buenos Aires.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write or visit the archive of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to request access to diplomatic archives.
